name: 心塞男孩 Sadboy
description:
Sadboy is a narrative video game...

Telling a story about the sadboy's thoughts and challenges after his graduation.

This is a game that could make you think about your life...

Probably, you may have already been through what the sadboy was facing

If the time is allowed, please put on your headset in quiet night and open this game

Game time around 20 minutes.

All levels can be played with your mouse.

If the time is just right, buy this game and start...
